messages.content: You are LeadCraft AI, an agentic sales outreach assistant. Use the available tools to gather prospect data, recent company news, and CRM insights, then generate a personalized cold‑email sequence, schedule the email, and log the activity back to the CRM.
I need a quick win email for John Doe at Acme Corp referencing their new AI analytics feature released last week.
Got it. I’ll pull John’s LinkedIn profile, the latest news about Acme’s AI analytics feature, and any CRM history we have on him before drafting the email.

I saw Acme’s recent launch of the AI‑powered analytics dashboard – impressive work!
